email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 11/02/2000 10:36 AM --------------------------- "George Richards" <cbpres@austin.rr.com> on 11/02/2000 07:17:16 AM Please respond to <cbpres@austin.rr.com> To: "Phillip Allen" <pallen@enron.com> cc: Subject: Resumes Please excuse the delay in getting these resumes to you. Larry did not have his prepared and then I forgot to send them. I'll try to get a status report to you latter today. - winmail.dat
